domain

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.util.Observable
      • domain.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends domain.util.Observable
    Class that controls main flow of the game.
    Author:
    Team Pennybags
    Overview:
    Takes requests from UI part of the game and delegates responsibilities to corresponding classes, communicates with other classes of domain. Created using Controller Pattern of GRASP Patterns.

        Parameters:

        Requires:
        gameName is not null
        Effects:
        initializes all fields of this
        Modifies:

      • registerUser

        public boolean registerUser(java.lang.String nickName,
                            java.lang.String tokenName)
        Registers a new player with the given nick name and token name if arguments are unique and valid.
        Parameters:
        nickName - Nick name of the player.
        tokenName - Name of the token.
        Returns:
        true if new player with nickName as its name and tokenName as its token is created, false otherwise.
        Requires:
        nickName is not null, tokenName is one of the image names of tokens
        Effects:
        if the nickName and tokenName are available, a new player with nickName is created and added to the players list. token with tokenName is created and tokenName is removed from the availableTokenNames list of Token class.
        Modifies:
        this, Token
